title: 85/165/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 February 1985 amending Decision 83/96/EEC authorizing Ireland and the United Kingdom temporarily to take additional measures to protect themselves against the introduction of Dendroctonus micans (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 8 February 1985
amending Decision 83/96/EEC authorizing Ireland and the United Kingdom temporarily to take additional measures to protect themselves against the introduction of Dendroctonus micans
(Only the English text is authentic)
(85/165/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 (1) of Decision 83/96/EEC, '31 January 1985' is hereby replaced by '31 January 1986'.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland and to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 February 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(2) OJ No L 207, 2. 8. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 61, 8. 3. 1983, p. 20.
(4) OJ No L 38, 9. 2. 1984, p. 38.
